name: they
definition: Used to refer to two or more people or things previously mentioned or easily identified.

name: there
definition: In, at, or to that place or position.

name: apple
definition: The round fruit of a tree of the rose family, which typically has thin green or red skin and crisp flesh.

name: table
definition: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs, providing a level surface for eating, writing, or working at.

name: new
definition: Produced, introduced, or discovered recently or now for the first time; not existing before.
